channel.title: 软件配置 on Jekst
channel.description: Recent content in 软件配置 on Jekst

item.title: Git常用配置
item.description: 1[user] 2 name = 用户名 3 email = 邮箱 4[credential] 5 helper = manager 6 7[alias] 8 st = status 9 co = checkout 10 ci = commit 11 br = branch 12 di = diff 13[url "ssh://git@github.com/"] 14 insteadOf = https://github.com/ 15

item.title: Golang配置
item.description: 1go env -w GO111MODULE=auto 2go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn,direct 3go env -w GOPRIVATE=*.example.com

item.title: Zsh配置
item.description: zsh自定义配置 1#Tell ls to be colourful 2export CLICOLOR=1 3export LSCOLORS="Gxfxcxdxbxegedabagacad" 4#Tell grep to highlight matches 5export GREP_OPTIONS='--color=auto' 6# Enabling completion 7autoload -U compinit && compinit 8# Enabling color prompt 9autoload -U colors && colors 10# Enabling and setting git info var to be used in prompt config. 11autoload -Uz vcs_info 12zstyle ':vcs_info:*' enable git svn 13# This line obtains information from the vcs. 14zstyle ':vcs_info:git*' formats " - (%b)" 15precmd() { 16 vcs_info 17} 18 19# Enable substitution in the prompt.
